title: SET_GLOBAL_PASSENGER_MASS_MULTIPLIER
content:
0x1C47F6AC// SetGlobalPassengerMassMultiplier
void SET_GLOBAL_PASSENGER_MASS_MULTIPLIER(float massMul);Parameters:massMul: Weight of each passenger (not counting the driver) as a percentage of vehicle mass. Is applied to all vehicles. Default value is 0.05
